column1: Uchi////The food.... we had the zero zen roll that was excellent - flavorful and creamy. The divers scallop sushi pieces were also very good
column3: they melted in your mouth. Then
column4: the hamachi nabe was quite good as well
column5: very flavorful. My husband liked the dessert
column6: we ordered the fried milk. Other dishes were better than average
column7: but forgettable. After visiting Morimoto's restaurant in New York
column8: this was a bit of a disappointment.
